# DataBlockCollection.ToString method

Devuelve una cadena que representa al objeto [`DataBlockCollection`](../DataBlockCollection.md) actual.

```csharp
public override string ToString()
```

## Return Value

String representing the current [`DataBlockCollection`](../DataBlockCollection.md) object.

## Remarks

The `ToString` method returns a string that includes the number of available blocks.
